mapper.insert: insert into bt_se (bt_se_id, info_id, bt_se_classic_lowenergy, bt_se_rate, bt_se_count, bt_se_freq, bt_se_band, bt_se_bandfreq, bt_se_bandresult, bt_se_bandpicture, bt_se_bandjudgement, bt_se_time, bt_se_delete) values (#{btSeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{btSeClassicLowenergy,jdbcType=BIT}, #{btSeRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{btSeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{btSeFreq,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{btSeBand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{btSeBandfreq,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{btSeBandresult,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{btSeBandpicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{btSeBandjudgement,jdbcType=BIT}, #{btSeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{btSeDelete,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update bt_se set info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bt_se_classic_lowenergy = #{btSeClassicLowenergy,jdbcType=BIT}, bt_se_rate = #{btSeRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bt_se_count = #{btSeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bt_se_freq = #{btSeFreq,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bt_se_band = #{btSeBand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bt_se_bandfreq = #{btSeBandfreq,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bt_se_bandresult = #{btSeBandresult,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bt_se_bandpicture = #{btSeBandpicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bt_se_bandjudgement = #{btSeBandjudgement,jdbcType=BIT}, bt_se_time = #{btSeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bt_se_delete = #{btSeDelete,jdbcType=BIT} where bt_se_id = #{btSeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select bt_se_id, info_id, bt_se_classic_lowenergy, bt_se_rate, bt_se_count, bt_se_freq, bt_se_band, bt_se_bandfreq, bt_se_bandresult, bt_se_bandpicture, bt_se_bandjudgement, bt_se_time, bt_se_delete from bt_se where bt_se_id = #{btSeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select bt_se_id, info_id, bt_se_classic_lowenergy, bt_se_rate, bt_se_count, bt_se_freq, bt_se_band, bt_se_bandfreq, bt_se_bandresult, bt_se_bandpicture, bt_se_bandjudgement, bt_se_time, bt_se_delete from bt_se
